text: Keith Claudius Mitchell (born 12 November 1946) is a Grenadian politician. He became Prime Minister of Grenada in February 2013. He also served as Prime Minister from 1995 to 2008. He was the longest serving Prime Minister Grenada has ever had, holding the office for just over 13 years. He lost re-election in 2022 to Dickon Mitchell. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Grenada Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Keith Mitchell
